name: Slide-Fu: Tiger v Snake Edition
description:
Slide-Fu is a 2D fighting game based on two of the five animal styles of Kung-Fu. Slide and dodge to defeat each other and claim victory for your clan once and for all.

- Three different stages

- Play as Tiger or Snake

- Intense sliding combat

Release Date: Novemeber 17 2015

Platform: WIndows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10

Price: Free
